document.masterDocTitle: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Suctobelba trigona (Michael, 1888)
*

· Original name:
Notaspis trigona Michael, 1888
.
· In: British Oribatidae, Vols. I and II. Ray Soc., London. 656 pp.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Dameosoma trigonum (Michael) Berlese, 1896
;
Suctobelba ( Suctobelba ) trigona (Michael) Subías, 2004
.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s :
Sphagnum ( Halbert 1915 )
; fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ; unpublished data); pastures, Sitka spruce forests and blanket bogs (rough grazing) (
Arroyo et al. 2009a
); Machair fixed (stable) dunes and Machair grassland (Arroyo and Bolger 2011); moss on soil in oak, Scots pine and Sitka spruce forests, moss in canopy in oak and Scots pine forests and soil in Scots pine and Sitka spruce forests (
Arroyo et al. 2012
, 2013b ); moss in canopy and moss on trunk in yew forest (
Arroyo et al . 2013c
); agricultural grassland and ant nests (
Arroyo et al. 2015
); canopy in ash forests (unpublished data). Counties: Clare , Cork , Galway , Kerry , Kilkenny , Limerick , Mayo , Roscommon , Sligo , Tipperary and Wicklow .

·
Suctobelbella acutidens (Forsslund, 1941)
*

· Original name
Suctobelba acutidens Forsslund, 1941
.

· In: Schwedische Arten der Gattung
Suctobelba Paoli
( Acari, Oribatei ). Zoologiska Bidrag fran Uppsala, 20, 381–396.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Suctobelbella ( Suctobelbella ) acutidens (Forsslund) Subías, 2004
.

·
Suctobelbella longicuspis Jacot, 1937
*

· Original name:
Suctobelbella longicuspis Jacot, 1937
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
· In: Journal of North-American moss-mites.
Journal of the
New York
Entomological Society, Soc.,
45, 353-375.

subSubSection.paragraph:
· Historical combinations/variations:
Suctobelba longicuspis (Jacot) Marshall, 1968
;
Suctobelbella ( Suctobelbella ) longicuspis (Jacot) Subías, 2004
.
Counties: Cork , Donegal , Galway , Kerry , Laois , Limerick , Mayo , Offaly , Tipperary , Wexford and Wicklow .

·
Suctobelbella nasalis (Forsslund, 1941)
*

· Original name:
Suctobelba nasalis Forsslund, 1941
.
· In: Zoologiska Bidrag fran Uppsala , 20, 388.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Suctobelbella ( Flagrosuctobelba ) nasalis (Forsslund) Subías, 2004
.

· Synonyms:
Dameosoma bellum Berlese, 1904
sp. inq.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Agricultural grassland (Curry 1976). Counties: Kildare .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Suctobelbella perforata (Strenzke, 1950)

· Original name:
Suctobelba perforata Strenzke, 1950
.
· In: Archiv für Hydrobiologie , 44.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Suctobelbella ( Suctobelbella ) perforata (Strenzke) Subías, 2004
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Bog, grassland, heather and shelter belt on peat ( Longworth 1973 ). Counties: Mayo .

·
Suctobelbella sarekensis (Forsslund, 1941)
*

· Original name:
Suctobelba sarekensis Forsslund, 1941
.

· In: Schwedische arten der gattung
Suctobelba Paoli
( Acari, Oribatei ). Zoologiska Bidrag fran Uppsala, 20, 381–396.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Suctobelbella sarekensis (Forsslund) Rubkova, 1973
;
Suctobelbella ( Suctobelbella ) sarekensis (Forsslund) Subías, 2004
.

· Synonyms:
Suctobelba cornigera sensu Trägårdh 1910
no Berlese, 1902 [misidentification].

materialsCitation.location: Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Limerick, Mayo, Waterford and Wicklow
materialsCitation.stateProvince: Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Limerick, Mayo, Waterford and Wicklow

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Limerick, Mayo, Waterford and Wicklow .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Suctobelbella subcornigera (Forsslund, 1941)
*

· Original name:
Suctobelba subcornigera Forsslund, 1941
.
· In: Zoologiska Bidrag fran Uppsala , 20, 394.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Suctobelbella subcornigera (Forsslund) Moritz, 1970
;
Suctobelbella ( Suctobelbella ) subcornigera (Forsslund) Subías, 2004
.
Counties: Clare , Galway , Kerry , Laois , Meath , Offaly , Tipperary , Roscommon , Sligo , Wexford and Wicklow .

·
Suctobelbella subtrigona (Oudemans, 1900)

· Original name:
Eremaeus subtrigona Oudemans, 1900
.
· In: New list of Dutch Acari , 1st Part. Tijdschrift voor entomologie , 43,150–171.

· Synonyms:
Suctobelba intermedia Willmann, 1939
.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Soil from sugar beet crop ( Breslin 1979 ); soil in Monterey pine and Sitka spruce plots and grassland (unpublished data); fungal sporocarps (unpublished data). Counties: Carlow, Kilkenny, Wexford and Wicklow .
